title: Veterinary Herbal Medicine | Veterinarian in Redlands, CA | Loma Linda
description: Herbs / Herbal medicine can assist with the treatment of many medical conditions of dogs and cats. It can be used as a sole agent, or more often in combination with traditional medicine. It can be a great option for pets that cannot tolerate traditional medicine due to side effects.
cleaned_text: Veterinary Herbal Medicine | Veterinarian in Redlands, CA | Loma Linda | Integrative Veterinary Medicine
